experiences.title: VP, Business Development, Sales & Events
experiences.summary:
- I manage a team base out of Singapore, Indonesia and Japan. 
- My team main focus is to grow Tech in Asia's sales and events business. We are also responsible for the growth of TiA's startup community. 
- Organize Startup Asia Singapore, Tokyo and Jakarta. 
- Help corporations to enter the startup ecosystem. 
- Connect startups with investors. 
- Engage developers via hackathon and workshop.

experiences.title: Head of Japan, Business Development
experiences.summary:
- Connect Japan and the rest of Asia in the startup ecosystem. 
- Develop strategies for large Japanese companies to increase more brand awareness in the startup scene. 
- Help startups to gain more exposure to the markets outside of Japan. 
- Connect investors with startups across Asia.
- Organize Startup Asia Tokyo Conference to connect people at handshake level.
- Reach out to developers and provide them with platforms (hackathon, workshop) to create new app and software.

experiences.title: Business Development Manager
experiences.summary:
• Develop strategies for startups and corporate companies to increase brand awareness and brand engagement in Asia's technology ecosystem through Tech in Asia's platform. 
• Tech in Asia Meetup in Singapore, Indonesia, Vietnam, Thailand, Japan, Taiwan, China, Hong Kong and Malaysia. 
• Connecting with startups, investors, corporate companies and developers in Asia. Aim to help and value add the above group of people in the startup ecosystem.
• Plan, organise, execute the entire operation for Startup Asia Singapore Conference. My goal is to help brands develop marketing solutions. Providing an avenue for startups or developers to find strategic business partnership or investment. 
• Sourcing good content for Tech in Asia Meetup.

experiences.title: Owner
experiences.summary:
• Design, develop and implement strategic initiatives and business plans for the company.
• Organize and manage the execution of various organizational policies and programs.
####• Oversee the day-to-day operation of the company; Supervising the manager and administrative
staff.
• Acquire and build strategic client relationships; Handle customers’ enquiries and complaints.
• Manage company accounts, marketing directions and human resources.
• Motivate, train and mentor staff and tutors to deliver a high level of customer service and
quality lessons.

experiences.title: Social Media Account Executive
experiences.summary: • Develop social media strategy for SME.\r\n• Manage client's account and back-end work. \r\n• Perform sales duties.

experiences.title: Cadet
experiences.summary:
• Awarded the prestigious ‘Best Cadet 2006’.
• Created curriculum and teaching material for the company’s school and community project.
• Deeply involved in learning about the social work sector, different characteristic and traits --#
units of social work, appropriate social communication skills and body language.
• Spearheaded community projects for P.O.D Youth Cafe#.
• Planned and organize community involvement projects for students to participate in schools
and elderly home.

experiences.title: Administrative Executive
experiences.summary: • Provided assistance in the administrative procedures for the “Treasury-Department”.\r\n• Assisted in the loan and credit procedures in the department.\r\n• Participated in the dissemination of mail postal information for the department.
